title: Borders, 1992-139-61, 1900–40
creditline: Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook
description: Floral and geometric border. Motifs have the appearance of mosaics, with floral sprigs in between. Printed in pink, blue, green, yellow and lavender in a gray framework. Black highlights are added to give a 3-D look. Printed on off-white ground. The width has been cut with four borders remaining.
